name: Share Line
author: Karun Jaraslertsuwan

sections.description:
This plugin will create a Line button for share a content to Line’s timeline or your frined in Line application

The button will create on mobile site only. It useless when click on pc browser.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Why do not I see a button ?

This plugin will create on mobile site. You have to view by mobile phone and then you will see on the bottom of content.

screenshots.caption: This screen shot description corresponds to screenshot-1.(png|jpg|jpeg|gif). Note that the screenshot is taken from the /assets directory or the directory that contains the stable readme.txt (tags or trunk). Screenshots in the /assets directory take precedence. For example, /assets/screenshot-1.png would win over /tags/4.3/screenshot-1.png (or jpg, jpeg, gif).
